    Divides this matrix by a scalar, then returns the resulting matrix.
    Matrix
    Matrix.map(DoubleUnaryOperator mapper)
    Applies the provided mapper function to each element of this grid, then returns a new grid whose elements are populated from that of the return values of the provided mapper function.
    Matrix
    Matrix.merge(DoubleGrid g, DoubleBinaryOperator merger)
    Applies the provided merger function to each corresponding pair of elements between this grid and the provided grid g, then returns a new grid whose elements are populated from that of the return values of the provided merger function.

    Multiplies this matrix by a scalar, then returns the resulting matrix.

    Returns the negation of this matrix.

    Creates a new n-dimensional identity matrix.

    Creates a new matrix containing the provided values.
    Matrix
    Matrix.resize(int rows, int columns)
    Returns a new grid with the provided dimensions whose elements are populated from that of this grid's elements, trimmed or padded with 0 values as necessary.
    Matrix

    Subtracts a scalar from this matrix, then returns the resulting matrix.
